game.name: Sacrificio
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A nerve wrecking struggle against industrialized human sacrifice, and a army of flesh husks in the deepest reaches of human understanding.
